name: Rug Burn OG
description: Rug Burn OG took 3rd place for hybrids at the 2012 High Times Cannabis Cup. By crossing Ghost OG with Rare Dankness #1, Rare Dankness Seeds has created a pungent flavor mix of sour citrus and hints of diesel that sting the senses. Though listed as an indica-leaning hybrid, Rug Burn provides an uplifting effect that helped it make its way onto High Times’ list of “Earth’s Strongest Strains 2014.”
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Focused, Stress, Depression, Pain, Insomnia, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy
